sentences.en: A multitude of disconnected images and ideas are launched at the viewer.
sentences.cn: 一堆杂乱无章的图像呈现在观众面前.

sentences.en: But what really happens is a change in the viewer.
sentences.cn: 不过其实是观察者自身发生了变化.

sentences.en: Font viewer view sample text in all available fonts.
sentences.cn: 字体查看器样文在所有可用的字体.

sentences.en: I like those TV programs which enlighten the viewer as well as entertain him.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢那些既使观众得到娱乐又使观众受到教育的电视节目.

sentences.en: In one ad the viewer scarcely sees the car's exterior.
sentences.cn: 在一则广告中，观众几乎看不到汽车的外观。

sentences.en: Integrated graphical viewer for visual inspection of the layouts.
sentences.cn: 综合图形查看目视检查布局.

sentences.en: Physical Memory Viewer, to view memory and output to a file.
sentences.cn: 物理内存查看器, 用于查看内存和输出到文件.

sentences.en: Positioned so that the head is turned toward the viewer.
sentences.cn: 头转向观看者的放置成头转向观看者的姿态的.

sentences.en: The foreground, nearest the viewer, is painted last.
sentences.cn: 距离观者最近的前景是最后才画的。

sentences.en: The new series has gone down well with viewers.
sentences.cn: 这个新的电视系列片很受观众欢迎。

sentences.en: These images are likely to evoke a strong response in the viewer.
sentences.cn: 这些图像可能会在观众中产生强烈反响.

sentences.en: They allow the viewer to see and feel the room self - reference.
sentences.cn: 这房间可以从时空的所有“视角”来观看——不只是某个特殊“视角”或一群有限 “ 视角”.

sentences.en: Think about what you want the viewer to see.
sentences.cn: 想想你先之前想看到的效果.

sentences.en: This special viewer is simple to use and comes with 70 full-colour slides.
sentences.cn: 这个特别的观片器操作简单，配有70张全彩幻灯片。

sentences.en: To the unsophisticated ( ie naive ) mind of the average viewer.
sentences.cn: 对于一般观众的单纯心理.

sentences.en: To view actual AC waveform signature, use Waveform Viewer.
sentences.cn: 若想观看实际的AC电压波形, 可使用波形观察器功能.

words.tran_cn: 无景色的；无意见的；看不见的
[光]观察者；观看者；电视观众；[仪]指示器

phrases.tran_cn: 事件阅览器；事件查看器
文件浏览器；文件查看器
[计算机]图像浏览器；影像检视器

trans.tran_cn: 电视观众，观看者，观察者，阅读器，看片机（把幻灯片等放大观看的装置）
